name: Solar System (itch) (ChadPerkins)
description:
This is my Solar System project for the course "Game Design and Development 1: 2d Shooter" on Coursera. I added the following elements:

  1. Completed the rest of the planets in the Solar System.
  2. Added their associated textures
  3. Added sound to each of the planets.

Credits

Created by Chad Perkins.
